findings.title: SIP-145: Emit correct amount of SNX backed debt when taking a full debt snapshot
findings.description: Implemented a bug fix to emit the correct amount of SNX backed debt when taking a full debt snapshot.

findings.title: SIP-174: SynthRedeemer validation
findings.description: The SynthRedeemer contract only checks if the sUSD balance of the redeemer exceeds the total synth value being deprecated, but does not consider existing deprecated synths.

findings.title: Design comments (Informational) - Code simplifications
findings.description: Simplification of code in BaseDebtCache.sol contract to improve readability and maintainability.
